archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Energienetten opnemen in de besturing van energietransport
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: Het vermogen om netcomponenten op te nemen in de besturing van het energienet, zoals zichtbaar maken in de monitoring en aanstuurbaar maken door SCADA.

properties.value: Include energy grids in the control of energy transport
The ability to include net components in the operations of the energy grid, such as visibility in the monitoring and control of SCADA.
